name: Violin
description: An elegant violin, seemingly out of place, as if from a bygone era. Its caretakers (for surely there have been many generations, between which this delicate masterpiece has been passed) have done well to guard their custody.

target_responses.take: As you reach for the violin, a foreboding gravitas domineers you, and you gain a peripheral grasp on the depth of the instrument's storied past.
target_responses.play: You're not very good, but the spirit seems to stay your novice hand, and you are able to stumble through a simple yet haunting melody.

state_responses.broken_item: You devil! The Violin shatters and with it die the dreams of all those who love music, light, and joy in this god-forsaken reaml.
